attributes.action: stop the ban of XL American bulldogs
attributes.additional_details: It’s people getting there hands on them when they have no experience with these types of dogs thinking they are normal dogs when they need proper training
attributes.background:
stop the ban, as it’s not the dogs it’s the upbringing of the wrong people which makes them change their way they are harmless
If they are put in the right hands

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
